readAll

java.util.List<T> readAll()
                          throws java.io.IOException
Reads the entire file into a List. Each element is a bean of type T produced by the RowMapper

Returns:
a List of String[], with each String[] representing a line of the file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if bad things happen during the read
